name: vsm
tagline: Vector Space Model Framework developed for InPhO
body: # Welcome to VSM Tutorials for the Vector Space Model Framework developed for InPhO. ## Tutorials * [LDA (1): Training a model from a single file](#lda1) * LDA: Exploring documents and words * LDA: Exploring topics ## Authors and Contributors * Robert Rose (@rrose1) * Jun Otsuka (@junotk) * Tim Downey (@tcdowney) * Jesse Squires (@jessesquires) ## Support [Contact the InPhOrmers](https://inpho.cogs.indiana.edu/about/) *** *** LDA Tutorial (1): Training a model from a single file [top](#top)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
